rows.label: tlk502105_msg0001
rows.name: Ah... I feel like a new dude.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0002
rows.name: Hey! Has that tree taken your fancy?

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0012
rows.name:
Invidia's a pretty nice looking place,
don't you reckon? There's stuff here
you can't see anyplace else.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0013
rows.name:
If you're feeling a bit messed-up inside,
looking at a nice bit of scenery makes
you feel a whole lot better.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0014
rows.name:
Yes... It's kind of surprising, how
beautiful it is...

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0015
rows.name:
It's not easy, y'know... Fighting as a
mercenary in the Invidian army, I mean.
It's a tough way to earn your keep.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0016
rows.name:
It's worse than being a regular soldier.
If they need some cannon fodder for a
dangerous mission, we're it.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0018
rows.name:
Sure, you get a nice pay packet for
each job. But get injured, and you're
gonna be hard up for a while.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0019
rows.name:
If you take a good bruising, you might
be out of the game for months. If that
happens, maybe you don't break even.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0021
rows.name:
So sometimes, after a job, I come and
just have a look at the Invidian
landscape. Really heals me.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0022
rows.name:
Talking to a nice young woman like
you makes all the difference, too.

rows.label: tlk502105_msg0023
rows.name:
Hey, why don't you have this by way
of thanks? I got it for my old man,
but you have it!
